newsitem.title: USA: Sirrom's says acquisition to be accretive.
newsitem.headline: Sirrom's says acquisition to be accretive.

text.p: Sirrom Capital Corp (SCC) said on Tuesday that it completed the acquisition of Harris Williams & Co LP, a merger and acquisition advisory firm in Richmond, Va., and it expects the acquisition to accretive Sirrom's 1996 financial results.

SCC completed the transaction, which will be accounted for as a pooling of interests, for 898,454 restricted shares of SCC's common stock. SCC's stock was at 26-1/2, down 1/2 in early afternoon trading.
SCC had pretax operating income per share of $0.33 for the second quarter of 1996 and $0.59 for the first half of 1996.
